\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: The Stride UI layout system is similar to Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
O sistema de layout de IU Stride é semelhante ao Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
The Stride UI layout system is similar to Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
For more information about the WPF layout system, see the <g1>MSDN documentation</g1>.
Para obter mais informações sobre o sistema de layout WPF, consulte a documentação <g1>MSDN</g1>.
For more information about the WPF layout system, see the <g1>MSDN documentation</g1>.
Much of the WPF documentation also applies to the Stride layout system.
Grande parte da documentação WPF também se aplica ao sistema de layout Stride.
Much of the WPF documentation also applies to the Stride layout system.
Every @'Stride.UI.UIElement' in the Stride UI system has a surrounding rectangle used in layouts.
Cada @'Stride.UI.UIElement' no sistema de IU Stride tem um retângulo circundante usado em layouts.
Every @'Stride.UI.UIElement' in the Stride UI system has a surrounding rectangle used in layouts.

Stride computes layouts according to the @'Stride.UI.UIElement' requirement, available screen space, constraints, margins, padding, and the special behavior of @'Stride.UI.Panels.Panel' elements (which arrange children in specific ways).

Stride computa layouts de acordo com o @'Stride. UI.UIElement' exigência, espaço de tela disponível, restrições, margens, padding, e o comportamento especial de @'Stride. UI.Panels. Elementos do painel (que organizam crianças de maneiras específicas).

Stride computes layouts according to the @'Stride.UI.UIElement' requirement, available screen space, constraints, margins, padding, and the special behavior of @'Stride.UI.Panels.Panel' elements (which arrange children in specific ways).
Processing this data recursively, the layout system computes a position and size for every @'Stride.UI.UIElement' in the UI system.
Processamento de dados recursivamente, o sistema de layout computa uma posição e tamanho para cada @'Stride. UI.UIElement' no sistema UI.
Processing this data recursively, the layout system computes a position and size for every @'Stride.UI.UIElement' in the UI system.
Stride performs the layout process recursively in two passes:
Stride executa o processo de layout recursivamente em dois passes:
Stride performs the layout process recursively in two passes:

In the <g1>Measure</g1> pass, each element recursively computes its <g2>DesiredSize</g2> according to the properties you set, such as @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Width', @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Height', and @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Margin'.

No <g1> Medida </g1> pass, cada elemento computa recursivamente seu <g2>DesiredSize</g2> de acordo com as propriedades que você definiu, como @'Stride. UI.UIElement.Width', @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Height', e @'Stride.UI.UIElement. Margin's.

In the <g1>Measure</g1> pass, each element recursively computes its <g2>DesiredSize</g2> according to the properties you set, such as @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Width', @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Height', and @'Stride.UI.UIElement.Margin'.
Some @'Stride.UI.Panels.Panel' elements call <g1>Measure</g1> recursively to determine the  <g2>DesiredSize</g2> of their children, and act accordingly.
Alguns elementos @'Stride.UI.Panels.Panel chamam <g1>Measure</g1> recursivamente para determinar o <g2>DesiredSize</g2> de seus filhos, e agir de acordo.
Some @'Stride.UI.Panels.Panel' elements call <g1>Measure</g1> recursively to determine the  <g2>DesiredSize</g2> of their children, and act accordingly.
